page.title: 04RUISLIP LIDO
page.content: Ruislip Lido is a very pleasant place to visit in the summer. The woods are next to it,so lots of people go for walks there and also go horse-riding. The lake is very large and a small part of it is separated for swimming although it is not very clean.Also there are small canoes and boats for children.There is plenty of space to sunbathe and have picnics.Swings and slides along with sandpits are over by the side of the water.A little train runs part of the way around the Lido.There is water-skiing on the rest of the lake and also competitions take place as well.In the winter they hold Guy Fawkes night there,and it is a spectacular sight to see all the fireworks going up into the sky over the floodlit water.
